alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 10:21AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN LANCASTER AND SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTIES THROUGH 1100 AM EDT... At 1020 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southeast of Red Lion, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Sunnyburn around 1025 AM EDT. Holtwood around 1030 AM EDT. Wakefield around 1035 AM EDT. Quarryville and Smithville around 1040 AM EDT. Strasburg around 1045 AM EDT. Paradise around 1050 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Christiana, Buck, White Horse, Peach Bottom and Refton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
